sourcesContent: import styles from "./CartItem.module.css"; import { useRef } from "react"; const CartItem = ({ cart }) => { const quantityRef = useRef(); const increaseQuantityHanlder = () => { quantityRef.current.value = +quantityRef.current.placeholder + 1; }; return ( {cart.product.name} {Number(cart.product.price).toLocaleString("de-DE")} VND {cart.total} ); }; export default CartItem;
